tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
*Fgenesh is a genome annotation tool*
**Input**
- input file - Genome or de novo assembly file in FASTA format
**Command line Example:**
- FGENESHPIPE/split_multi_fasta.pl <file> -name [count|seq_id] -dir output_directory -ext [fa|seq]
- file - file with multiple FASTA sequences - name - seq_id = use sequences IDs in filenames; count = use numbers in filenames (count starting from 1) - dir - directory where to put files - ext - extension for fasta files
**Output**
- a collection of fasta files
**Notes:**
- Galaxy can only genreate output dataset up to 10000. Please filter out shorter contigs if the number of contigs > 10000 in your input datasets.
.. class:: infomark
**Contributor**
Galaxy Australia wrapped the Fgenesh: the original software is available on this website `FGENESH <http://www.softberry.com/berry.phtml?topic=fgenesh_plus_plus&group=help&subgroup=pipelines>`_. Note: The software license needs to be acquired prior to use.
